content: cell phone/ mp3 player case this small case may not be exactly what you wanted to learn to crochet for but it s a great starting point it s wonderfully simple and a quick finish once you get these basics down you ll be set and ready to go and you can adjust the pattern for a larger purse for a young girl the sky is the limit enjoy it notions small amount of ww yarn like bernat super value h hook 5 0 large eyed needle button notes chain = chain single_crochet= single_crochet double_crochet= double_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch chain 3 turning chain always counts as 1st double_crochet in next row chain 11 row 1 single_crochet across chain 1 turn 10 sts total row 2 single_crochet across chain 1 turn row 3-5 repeat row 2 row 6 single_crochet across chain 3 turn row 7 double_crochet across chain 3 turn row 8-9 repeat row 7 row 10 double_crochet across chain 2 turn row 11 half_double_crochet across chain 2 turn row 12 -
